General.Name: AMD Industries Limited
General.Description: AMD Industries Limited manufactures and sells a range of packing solutions in India and internationally. The company offers various types of crown caps, including PVC spun, molded, and dry blend crown caps; PET preforms, bottles, jars, and containers; and CSD closures for use in soft drink, beverage, water, beer, liquor, and pharmaceutical industries. It is also involved in the development of a commercial complex in Gurugram, Haryana. The company was founded in 1958 and is headquartered in New Delhi, India.
